text: Awo Eriyakimu ne Sebuna ne Yoswa ne bagamba Labusake nti, “Tukwegayiridde yogera n’abaddu bo mu Lusuuli kubanga tulumanyi, toyogera naffe mu Luyudaaya36:11 Oluyudaaya lwe lulimi olwekikungu olwakozesebwanga mu biro ebyo. Oluyudaaya lwafuukira ddala olulimi Abayudaaya lwe bakozesa okuva mu 5 bc. ng’abantu abali ku bbugwe bawulira.”
